---
title: "Program 2 Graph Analysis"
author: "Ryan Schaefer and Wes Anderson"
output: pdf_document
---

```{r}
library(ggplot2)
data = read.csv("sorting.csv")
data
```
```{r}
insertionTimes = aggregate(insertion_time ~ var_type + size, data = data, FUN = mean)
ggplot(insertionTimes, aes(x = size, y = insertion_time, color = var_type)) + 
  geom_line() + 
  labs(title = "Insertion Sort Time By Data Set Size and Data Type", x = "Data Set Size", y = "Insertion Sort Time") + 
  guides(color = guide_legend(title = "Data Type"))
```
